about_the_game:
The Fear & Greed Weapon Pack contains three brand new weapons, each coming with unique new mods in addition to sharable mods.

  • The devastating TAS-12 has been a favorite of law enforcement and criminals alike for over a decade due to its reliability and power.
  • The versatile Jackknife SE5 is a classically beautiful choice used with distinction by professionals and home defenders.
  • The uniquely recognizable Garstini Viper .50AE has been a popular choice by movie villains for decades, able to send helmets flying - effortlessly.

content_descriptors.notes: PAYDAY 3 contains repeated displays of gun violence, including the shooting of civilians and law enforcement. PAYDAY 3 references alcohol and tobacco as well as illegal drugs in a lighthearted way.
